Label: Term Source Name
Description: The name of the source of a term; i.e. the source controlled vocabulary or ontology. These names will be used in all corresponding Term Source REF fields that occur elsewhere.

Label: Term Source File
Description: A file name or a URI of an official resource.

Label: Term Source Version
Description: The version number of the Term Source to support terms tracking.

Label: Term Source Description
Description: Use for disambiguating resources when homologous prefixes have been used.
